alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 3:47AM CDT until March 31 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. Snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches and localized higher totals greater than 3 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 7 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
